biotools.summary: Web application designed to selectively mutate predicted miRNA target sites while ensuring that predicted target sites for other miRNAs, termed illegitimate target sites, are not created in the process.

bioschemas.name: ImiRP
bioschemas.summary: Web application designed to selectively mutate predicted miRNA target sites while ensuring that predicted target sites for other miRNAs, termed illegitimate target sites, are not created in the process.
